name: Zombie Conspiracy Early-Access
description:
𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘆 𝗭𝗼𝗺𝗯𝗶𝗲 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘀𝗽𝗶𝗿𝗮𝗰𝘆 𝟬.𝟭 𝗧𝗼𝗱𝗮𝘆!

Zombie Conspiracy: Fight endless rounds against ruthless zombies, collect cash to open doors, buy perks, Pack-A-Punch your gun, & More!

Game also includes drops, more info on that below.

Need personal help? join our Discord & Create a ticket: https://discord.gg/FTmrYbEN8w

Do you want to report a bug? visit: https://www.coding-community.com/bugreport

Zombie Conspiracy Borrows many awesome concepts from COD Zombies, for example: Pack-A-Punch, Perks, Drops like instakill, maxammo, extracash, doublepoints, nuke, deathmachine & more.

𝗗𝗼𝘄𝗻𝗹𝗼𝗮𝗱 𝗯𝗲𝗹𝗼𝘄!

𝗭𝗢𝗠𝗕𝗜𝗘 𝗖𝗢𝗡𝗦𝗣𝗜𝗥𝗔𝗖𝗬 𝗜𝗡-𝗚𝗔𝗠𝗘 𝗦𝗧𝗢𝗥𝗘:

The game has an in-game store with in-game currency, please note that you earn this currency by playing the game [NO MICRO TRANSACTIONS]

Buy different Crosshair's, XP Card's, & Game enhancements in the store!

𝗚𝗟𝗢𝗕𝗔𝗟 𝗧𝗢𝗣 𝟱:

Zombie Conspiracy has a Global Top 5! can you get into it? visit the top 5 menu in the main menu!

𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐥𝐥𝐬:

W-A-S-D: Walk

Q: Switch Weapon's

E: Weapon Inspect

F: Interact, Buy & Pickup

LMB: Shoot
